text: The Women's 1500 metres event at the 2006 IAAF World Indoor Championships was held on March 11–12. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Yuliya Fomenko '''' |Yelena Soboleva '''' |Maryam Yusuf Jamal '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 of each heat (Q) and the next 3 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
